description: Add copy code button to CodeExample
context:
Beads description:
Add a copy-to-clipboard button to the CodeExample component. Should appear on hover or always visible in the code block header area. Clicking copies the raw code to clipboard with visual feedback (e.g., checkmark icon or 'Copied!' text briefly). Should work across all browsers and handle the async clipboard API gracefully.
